duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate, track and report on all Retail-based projects, initiatives, and programs.
Develop, organize, and coordinate the daily communications of bank matters that impact the branch network.
Support Retail management with the coordination of all Retail sales initiatives.
Utilize system capabilities (e.g., BIC, CRM) to track and analyze branch and individual employee sales performance and the monitoring of sales campaigns/events.

Assist with development, implementation and promotion of retail banking projects (e.g., financial literacy programs, product/service launches, promotional campaigns, branch-of-the-future technology and designs).
Organize Retail Management Meetings with input for the agenda, report creation and documentation (minutes) for the meetings.
Oversee management of monthly Head Teller meeting initiative in conjunction with Training department and Branch Administrator.
Manage direction of the Retail Mobile Staff to include daily scheduling, time/attendance tracking in Paylocity, and collection/reporting of float evaluations.
Maintain and keep current all branch monthly staffing schedules to accurately determine and address staffing needs with guidance from Retail Management.
Perform all duties in accordance with prescribed regulatory compliance guidelines and bank policies and procedures.

Represent the Bank in the communities it serves by participating in civic/community organizations to assist in brand awareness and supporting the Bank's mission of being a dedicated and responsible corporate citizen.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
